description.en:
Bridge Protocol (BRDG) is building new tools and standards for businesses, KYC and ICOs. The Bridge Protocol provides enterprise solutions using blockchain technology to comply to global regulations. Our work involves creating avenues for safe, legal and compliant Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs). Bridge is creating an open, distributed network of validators which regulate the behavior of its participants to provide high assurance interactions.

Bridge Protocol offers standardization tools for blockchain and non-blockchain business processes. Tier classification allows for compliance through contract code. These strategies allow for lower cost KYC and legal vetting between parties without the hassle. Our digital certificates keep your sensitive information off the chain and secure, so the user and business have instant points-of-trust.

Bridge will allow existing integration to standard practices by way of digitalization of agreements like the SAFT, employment arrangements and more.

Bridge BRDG tokens fuel the storefronts that offer identity services, Know-Your-Customer (KYC) solutions and access legal services providers on the blockchain.

status_updates.description:
Our team is excited to launch Bridge 3.0 for the blockchain community! 
Please read about how we leverage both Ethereum & NEO networks to drive our Identity solution. #IdentitySecured 
https://medium.com/bridgeprotocol/bridge-identity-platform-3-0-released-532cd1e72b4b

Hello CoinGecko Community! The Bridge team is happy to join the new beta Beam feature here to keep our followers updated throughout our progression. Please take a moment to review our latest community update which details the early identity platform demonstration video and our recent exchange listing on HitBTC for the utility token, TOLL. 

https://medium.com/@bridgeprotocol/bridge-protocol-early-identity-platform-demonstration-and-one-more-thing-32d7d884a33c

This can also be found on the Bridge Medium page linked right on our website.

Our team is extremely proud to announce that we have completed the Bridge Protocol Release 2.0!

Please review the medium article for further details regarding this update for our open sourced identity solutions. 
https://medium.com/@bridgeprotocol/bridge-protocol-release-2-0-4211cc65488b

Our team is extremely excited to have Aver joining the Bridge Marketplace! Aver brings an easy and affordable way of compliance for users and businesses to trust. 
https://medium.com/@bridgeprotocol/new-identity-verification-provider-joins-the-bridge-marketplace-e25b34373f88

Our CEO was pleased to participate in bringing this FREE information to the community and those looking to learn about STOs, IEOs and blockchain. Thank you NEO for organizing this meeting.

https://medium.com/neo-smart-economy/neo-digital-asset-alliance-round-table-meeting-4-6044fad41ea0

Hello Everyone!
The Google Chrome Web Store has granted final approval of the Bridge Passport Extension. You can now simply download the extension to your browser in seconds. The Bridge Passport extension can also be downloaded directly from the Bridge GitHub and used with any chromium-based browser such as Opera, Firefox and even Brave!

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/bridge-passport/colnlknbkldlhfhgeeakicpcbbaogffm

We are extremely proud to announce the completion of another milestone for Bridge. Please view our official Bridge Open Launch release which explains the newly upgraded smart contract, the Bridge Passport Extension, open sourced identity solutions on the blockchain and more!

https://medium.com/bridgeprotocol/bridge-protocol-open-launch-and-smart-contract-deployment-394fb108a6ab
